channel.title: Removing encryptions from Dat file passwords?
channel.description:
I'm a bit new to how the filing is arranged, but does anybody know where the save files are initially created when somebody goes to log-in a user for the first time (like which .java file controls that)? I'm looking to remove this weak numeric password encryption as it's only causing me issues with some web-integration I'm looking to do.
Thanks in advance.

item.title: Removing encryptions from Dat file passwords?
item.dc:creator: @Zukyak Zukyak
item.description:
@Zukyak wrote:

What source are you using?
